note:
Accidental eschatologist.
Studying sociology & networks, information ecosystems, disinfo & conspiracy theories, internet movements/cultures, nukes & bioweapons, cults, political violence, war & terror studies, transnational organized crime, Russia/Eastern Europe studies, IR.

Animal lover, big Golden Ratio dogs & #Uglydogs nerd.
Some posts about chronic illness, disability, art/graphics (traditional, mixed media, digital, photography), music & offline life.

I probably need a nap.

fields.name: Bio:
fields.value: Erstwhile burnout multimedia artist. Lapsed Pacifist. Antifascist.
